title: Childhood Christmas wish: GRANTED (Mame Gear Raspberry Pi build)
description:
Thanks to Zarcade and sponsor Grid Studio for helping me with this project!

Links to both of them below, and I hope you have a wonderful Christmas this year!

Mentioned in this video:

  - Grid Studio's Game Gear: https://gridstudio.cc/products/game-gear?utm_source=JeffGeerling
  - Zega Mame Gear: https://www.zegamamegear.uk/zega-mame-gear
  - Handheld Legend: https://handheldlegend.com
  - Brady Electronics Repair: https://bradyrepairs.com
  - RetroPie: https://retropie.org.uk

Videos referenced in this video:

  - Mame Gear assembly videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7_UQzDre3Zc
  - How I almost ruined MrBeast's 1-100 video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wsV_C9cMf8A
  - Sega Game Gear 'color' commercial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dwl6WDR1_8c
  - Sega Game Gear 'airplane' commercial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nTt0N2gzSqQ
